name: Vans Old Skool Yacht Club
description: Bringing a boldly color-blocked aesthetic to a classic silhouette, the Old Skool ‘Yacht Club’ features canvas quarter panels in kelly green, a suede toe cap and heel (in blue and yellow, respectively), and a leather sidestripe in white. Inspired by nautical flags, the sneaker is finished off with a white rubber midsole and red ‘Off the Wall’ logo on the heel.
